scripts.prepare-curve-mainnet: cp templates/constants.mainnet.ts src/constants.ts && cp subgraph.mainnet.yaml subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare-curve-polygon: cp templates/constants.polygon.ts src/constants.ts && cp subgraph.polygon.yaml subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.deploy-curve-mainnet: npm run clean && npm run prepare-curve-mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ gvladika/curve
scripts.deploy-curve-polygon: npm run clean && npm run prepare-curve-polygon && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ gvladika/curve-polygon
